Package by.grits.controllers

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
by.grits.controllers.UserController
public class UserController extends Object
This is class controller which provides console input\output. This class helps with creation of new user and authorization by collecting input data and passing this data to the responsible service.

  • Method Details

    • signUp

      public void signUp() throws DaoException
      This method is for registration of the new user. Requires console input from user. If input information do not pass validation, method will display correspond message If user with specific email already exists, method will display correspond message. If user with such email do not exist, method will display correspond message.
      Throws:
      DaoException - due to calling a service method with such exception.

    • logIn

      public boolean logIn() throws DaoException
      Method for logging an existing user. Requires user's console input.
      Throws:
      DaoException - due to calling a service method with such exception.

    • userCommands

      public void userCommands()
      This method displays menu for unregistered user

    • userMenu

      public void userMenu() throws DaoException
      This method reads user's console input and calls a corresponding method
      Throws:
      DaoException - due to calling methods with such exception.
